w:r.w:t: This is now our Minimum Viable Product.
To deliver a web-based application that enables users to plan weekly meals, manage recipes, and automatically generate grocery lists, while respecting dietary preferences and allergies.
Purpose: Secure access and personalized data
Users can log in and out securely
Each user accesses only their own data
Users can create and update profiles
Profile data is used during meal planning
Users can create a meal plan for a week
Users can modify meals at any time
Recipes can be reused in meal plans
Ingredients are structured data (not free text only
Auto-generate grocery list from meal plan
Users can revisit and modify past plans
Focus on stability, clarity, and correctness
UI, forms, weekly planner, grocery list
on top of the Core MVP
Each feature is scoped to be
Help users follow their planned meals consistently and reduce skipped meals.
Users can enable or disable meal reminders.
Users can set reminder times per meal (breakfast, lunch, dinner).
Notifications are sent before the scheduled meal time.
User sets meal plan for the week.
User receives reminders at the correct time.
User can modify or disable reminders.
Notifications are tied to meal plans.
Assist users in choosing meals faster while respecting preferences and restrictions.
System suggests meals when user is creating a meal plan.
AI ranks recipes based on relevance.
User can ignore or accept suggestions.
Provide health awareness without turning the app into a medical system.
Results displayed on meal plan dashboard.
Nutritional values are visible per meal.
Enable users to plan meals within financial limits.
Users set a weekly or monthly food budget.
Each ingredient has an estimated cost.
System warns if budget is exceeded.
One meal plan shared by multiple users.
Meal plan changes sync in real time.
Members see the same grocery list.
